etenbrinke.iocontroller.async.rest.service

Class IOServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • etenbrinke.iocontroller.async.rest.service.IOServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOService

    @Service
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=Settings.class)
public class IOServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOService
    Created by etenbrinke on 05/12/15.

      IOServiceImpl(java.lang.String serialDevice, int ioAddress)
      Set serialDevice and ioAddress address to enable serial communication The ioAddress+1 will be used to disable serial communication

public IOServiceImpl(@Value(value="${iocontroller.serialDevice}")

                                @Value(value="${iocontroller.ioAddress}")
                                int ioAddress)

        ioAddress - device address 144,146,148,150
